== Milestone Phases ==

=== Conceptualization ===

First phase of game development: Conceptual ideas for the game. Discussion of what the game should be and which mechanics should be included.

=== Pre-Production ===

Initial artistic concepts, risk/time assessment of game as well as for the group members and development strategy and basic game mechanics

=== Production ===

Production for all members, supervised by Game Designer and Project Manager.

=== Post-Production/Playtesting ===

Minor changes in design in accordance to player feedback, bug fixes.
